snippet.title: Ricochet Xtreme Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: http://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/ricochet-xtreme.html

Arcade fanatics prepare for battle. Take the helm of the Ricochet rocket as you maneuver your way through 170 levels of heart pounding fun. Each level brings a whole new combination of incredible powerups and obstacles. With four degrees of difficulty, Ricochet is as challenging as you can handle. Keep the ball bouncing or suffer the consequences.
